荴字的基本解释

荴
fū
散布：“函荾荴以俟风兮。”

荴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fū］
［《篇海》芳無切］
(1)敷布；散布。
(2)见“荴蔬”。

荴字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荴； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1032第04
【篇海】芳無切，音敷。【前漢·外戚傳】函荾荴以俟風兮，芳雜襲以彌音。【韋昭註】荴，荷葉未落時也。

荴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
荴字的起名意思

暂无。

Mongoose
Basic explanation of words
Mongoose
fū
Dissemination: "The letter to the mongoose is in the wind."
Mongoose
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fū］
[Fang Wuqi in "Pian Hai"]
(1) Compress; spread.
(2) See "Mongolian Vegetables".
Mongoose
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　 Mongoose; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1032 No. 04
【Pianhai】Fang Wuqie, sound pack. [Previous Han·Foreign Qi Biography] The letter of the mongoose is like the wind, and the fragrance is mixed with the sound. [Wei Zhao's Note] Mongoose, even when the lotus leaves are still not falling.
